title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an increased credit for development and to extend and simplify the credit for increasing research.
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow through 2018 a new business-related tax credit for an increase in expenditures for qualified development expenses , (2) increase to 20 the rate of the alternative simplified research tax credit, and (3) extend through 2018 the tax credit for increasing research activities.
